Html:
Do you have an idea of when the Beta tag will be removed from the latest version? I really need to use the 2013 version but my manager wont allow it while it's "in beta".

thanks

Hi There.

I still try to hold the version as beta because CRM 2013 implementation is only just started. We will target the release version as stable while more results are collected from real life projects

The library itself is an open source JavaScript library used by developers. Unlike CRM solutions, I do not really see there will problems or conflicts in your project. Maybe have a talk with your manager and try to explain why you want to use the library through the development. Hope it will be okay.

Thanks for your support.

Regards,
Jaimie

Hi Jaimie,

Thanks for developing the library. I'm planning on using it.
Have you got any news on this? How is the beta phase for 2013 going? And what's the plan for CRM 2015?

Regards,
Johnny

Hi There.

The current release version 2.1 is the stable release which should contain minimal bugs. As always, the library may not meet all requirements depending on the project.

Hope this helps.

Kind Regards,
Jaimie
